description: The creaminess of the avocado works perfectly with the sweetness of the tomato salsa in this delicious sandwich.
keywords: Sandwich,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smashed Avocado Sandwich with Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium avocado, de-seeded and taken from the skin.
1 small red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your salsa by chopping the onion and tomato into fine pieces. Mix the tomato and onion in a bowl with the oil, salt and pepper and set to one side.
Remove the pip from the avocado and take the flesh from the skin. Mash the avocado with a fork in bowl and set to one side. Layer the bread with the smashed avocado and salsa.
